sentences.english: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.chinese: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.english: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it

sentences.english: She spoke confidently into the microphone.
sentences.chinese: 她自信地对着麦克风说话。

sentences.english: They searched the room for hidden microphones.
sentences.chinese: 他们在屋里翻找隐藏的话筒。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you speak into to record your voice or make it louder when you are speaking or performing in public

name: program
trans: vt. 用程序指令；为…制订计划；为…安排节目
vi. 编程序；安排节目；设计电脑程式

sentences.english: Any large high-speed computer can be programmed to learn.
sentences.chinese: 任何大型高速计算机都可以通过编程获得学习能力。

detailed_translations.english: to give a computer a set of instructions that it can use to perform a particular operation

sentences.english: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.
sentences.chinese: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确信的， 肯定的； 自信的
detailed_translations.english: sure that something will happen in the way that you want or expect

name: voice
trans: n. 声音；嗓音；发言权；愿望

sentences.english: He recognized her voice instantly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻听出了她的声音。

sentences.english: I could hear angry voices.
sentences.chinese: 我听到了愤怒的声音。

detailed_translations.english: the sounds that you make when you speak, or the ability to make these sounds
to tell people your opinions or feelings about a particular subject

name: excellent
trans: adj. 卓越的；极好的；杰出的

sentences.english: an excellent suggestion
sentences.chinese: 极好的建议

sentences.english: His car is in excellent condition.
sentences.chinese: 他的汽车状况极佳。

sentences.english: Second-hand computers can be excellent value.
sentences.chinese: 二手计算机买得好会非常合算。

detailed_translations.english: extremely good or of very high quality

name: stage
trans: n. 阶段；舞台；戏剧；驿站
vi. 举行；适于上演；乘驿车旅行

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

name: heart
trans: n. 心脏；感情；勇气；心形；要点

sentences.english: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.english: Can you hear my heart beating?
sentences.chinese: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.english: Her cheeks were hot and her heart was pounding.
sentences.chinese: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.chinese: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.english: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.english: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.chinese: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.english: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

detailed_translations.english: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body

name: beat
trans: n. 拍子；敲击；有规律的一连串敲打
adj. 筋疲力尽的；疲惫不堪的
vi. 打；打败；拍打；有节奏地舒张与收缩

sentences.english: Somebody was beating at the door.
sentences.chinese: 有人在打门。

sentences.english: Brazil were beaten 2–1.
sentences.chinese: 巴西队以1比2告负。

sentences.english: Labour easily beat the Conservatives in the last election.
sentences.chinese: 工党在上一届选举中轻松击败保守党。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth many times, usually very hard

sentences.english: He shook his head slowly.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地摇了摇头。

sentences.english: ‘That’s true,’ said Joe slowly.
sentences.chinese: “没错。”乔慢吞吞地说道。

detailed_translations.english: at a slow speed

name: herself
trans: pron. 她自己（she的反身代词）；她亲自

sentences.english: She hurt herself.
sentences.chinese: 她弄伤了自己。

sentences.english: She must be very proud of herself.
sentences.chinese: 她一定非常自豪。

detailed_translations.english: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it

name: fail
trans: vi. 失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退
vt. 不及格；使失望；忘记；舍弃

sentences.english: It looks likely that the peace talks will fail.
sentences.chinese: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.english: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).
sentences.chinese: 数百万人戒过烟，都以惨败告终。

sentences.english: his efforts to save his failing marriage
sentences.chinese: 他挽救自己濒危婚姻的努力

sentences.english: The brakes on my bike failed half way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我骑自行车下山到中途刹车失灵了。

detailed_translations.english: to not succeed in achieving something

sentences.english: We want to prove that in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 我们要在墨西哥证明这一点。

sentences.english: The United States bounds on Mexico in the south.
sentences.chinese: 美国的南面与墨西哥接壤。

sentences.english: All but one of the deaths were in Mexico, the epicenter of the outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 除一人外，其他死亡患者都在疾病爆发的中心地墨西哥。

name: accept
trans: vt. 接受；承认；承担；承兑；容纳

sentences.english: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.english: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.english: Please accept this small gift.
sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.english: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that someone offers you, or to agree to do something that someone asks you to do

sentences.english: Moodie has been awarded a golf scholarship at the University of Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 穆迪获授夏威夷大学高尔夫奖学金。

sentences.english: The movie has won a number of awards.
sentences.chinese: 该片获得了多个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done
something such as a prize or money given to someone to reward them for something they have done

sentences.english: a teacher training college
sentences.chinese: 师范学院

sentences.english: Donna left school and went to art college.
sentences.chinese: 唐娜中学毕业后进了艺术学院。

sentences.english: Some people who want to go to college still can’t get there.
sentences.chinese: 有些想上大学的人仍然无法如愿。

detailed_translations.english: a school for advanced education, especially in a particular profession or skill

name: advise ... to do ...
trans: 建议做某事；建议某人去做某事

sentences.english: The event will go ahead as planned in Chicago next summer.
sentences.chinese: 该活动将按计划于明年夏天在芝加哥进行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 前进；（用于祈使句）可以；往下说
detailed_translations.english: If a process or an organized event goes ahead, it takes place or is carried out

name: play the violin
trans: 拉小提琴；弹小提琴；演奏小提琴

sentences.english: Her friend Julie liked to play the violin.
sentences.chinese: 她的朋友朱丽喜欢拉小提琴。

name: two peas in a pod
trans: 一模一样；一个豆荚里的两颗豌豆；步调一致

name: to one's surprise
trans: 使……惊讶的是；竟然；让某人惊讶的是

name: make a deal
trans: 达成交易；达成协议；做交易

sentences.english: We learned to play the piano by playing and drive a car by driving.
sentences.chinese: 我们以弹来学习弹钢琴，以驾驶来学习驾驶汽车。

sentences.english: Organizers of "Britain's Most Talented Pet" say they have found a dog that can mow the lawn and play the piano, the Daily Telegraph reported.
sentences.chinese: 据英国《每日电讯报》近日报道，"英国最有才华宠物"节目的组织者说，他们发现了一只既会除草又会弹钢琴的宠物狗。

sentences.english: So, despite not really knowing how to play the piano and not knowing how to read or write music, Cicoria got himself a piano and promptly began to play everything he heard in his head.
sentences.chinese: 于是，尽管实际上不知道该如何弹钢琴，也不知道如何读写乐谱，西科里拉还是给自己买了一台钢琴，并且立即开始弹奏脑子里听到的一切。

name: P.E.
trans: n. 体育（课）（全写为 physical education）

sentences.english: Some parents like the idea of avoiding competitive sports in P.E. class.
sentences.chinese: 一些家长支持不在体育课里教授竞技体育的想法。

sentences.english: At home, only two years of RE. were required. Here, P.E. was mandatory all four years.
sentences.chinese: 在我家那边，只需要上两年体育课，但在这里，体育课四年里都是必修课。

sentences.english: But experts say P.E. classes have changed.
sentences.chinese: 然而,专家说体育课已经发生了改变。

name: miss school
trans: 不能上学；没去上学；不到校

name: not ... at all
trans: na. 毫无(=〔美国英语〕 You are welcome)

name: a quarter
trans: 四分之一；一刻钟；二十五美分

name: Mother's Day
trans: na. (美国和加拿大的)母亲节

sentences.english: Then you must know that a bouquet of flowers and card, though very sweet, are not all it takes to make Mother's Day a true holiday.
sentences.chinese: 那么你应该知道一粟鲜花或是一张卡片，也许也很甜蜜，但是还不足以体现母亲节真正的意义。

detailed_translations.english: a day on which people give cards and presents to their mothers

name: Father's Day
trans: na. 〈美〉父亲节(每年六月的第三个星期日)

sentences.english: Thus informed, the people rose together on the designated day to overthrow the Yuan, and since that time mooncakes have become an integral part of the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 后来，人们在八月十五那天集合起来推翻了元朝统治。 从那以后，月饼成为中秋节不可或缺的元素。

detailed_translations.english: The Mid-Autumn Festival is a Chinese festival that is held to celebrate the end of the summer harvest, when the crops have been gathered. It is also called the .

name: such as
trans: un. 例如；像；象…这样；诸如…之类

sentences.english: But what if you have a lot of audio material to listen to, such as audio books or podcasts?
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你有很多像有声书或播客这样的音频材料要听，那该怎么办呢？

sentences.english: We have better use for our money such as saving or sharing it, and because I want my children to care about their impact on the environment, the economic state of our country and our humanity.
sentences.chinese: 我们要更好的用我们的钱，比如存起来或和别人一起共享，因为我希望我的孩子认识到他们自己对环境的影响，以及我们国家经济状况和我们的人性。

sentences.english: A better way to do all this is to load the data into one database, then perform a query, such as that shown below.
sentences.chinese: 做所有这些事情的一个更好办法是将数据加载到一个数据库中，然后执行查询，比如下面的查询。

name: too ... to ...
trans: 太……而不能；太……以致不能；用法

sentences.english: Perhaps on the other side of eternity, when I see God face to face.
sentences.chinese: 到那时可能我已经在天堂了，也已经面对面地见到了上帝。

sentences.english: Surprisingly the study, by Cambridge University, found children as well as adults preferred to communicate face to face.
sentences.chinese: 令人惊讶的是，剑桥大学的这一调查发现成人和孩子都更喜欢面对面交流。

sentences.english: “Hispanic and Asian customers prefer to do business face to face, so we give that outlet at our stores and then provide the in-language experience as well,” Correa said.
sentences.chinese: 科雷亚说："拉丁裔和亚裔顾客喜欢面对面地做生意，因此我们在专卖店中提供这种服务，同时让顾客享受自己语言的服务。"

name: stay in touch with ...
trans: 与……保持联系；与……保持联络；和……保持联系

name: the same size as ...
trans: 同……一样大；和……一样大小；与……一般大

name: try on
trans: na. 试穿；〈非正式〉搞恶作剧(以试探能否被容忍)；〈非正式〉耍花招

sentences.english: Try on clothing and shoes to make sure they fit.
sentences.chinese: 衣服和鞋要试穿以确保它们合适。

detailed_translations.english: If you try on a piece of clothing, you put it on to see if it fits you or if it looks nice

name: on the top of
trans: na. 在…之上；逼近；胜任(工作等)；掌握(情况等)

sentences.english: The light's a bit too harsh. You can turn it off.
sentences.chinese: 那灯光有点太刺眼。你可以关掉它。

detailed_translations.english: When you turn off a piece of equipment or a supply of something, you stop heat, sound, or water from being produced by adjusting the controls

name: make a wish
trans: 许愿；许个愿；许一个愿望

sentences.english: If you see a falling star, don't wonder why, just make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 如果您看到一颗流星，不要怀疑，只要许一个愿。

sentences.english: "Please make a wish when you fill in a single circular eye," Fukuda explained to Bush, according to the Japanese official.
sentences.chinese: 据这位日本官员介绍，福田首相向布什总统解释说，“画上一只眼睛后，请许下生日愿望。”

sentences.english: It is now my birthday. In the US, we have a tradition that when you blow out the candles on your birthday cake, you should make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 今天是我的生日.在美国,有这样一个传统:当你吹灭生日蛋糕上的蜡烛的时候,就可以许一个愿望.

name: blow out
trans: na. 取消；停止鼓风；(吹)胀；吹破

sentences.english: I blew out the candle.
sentences.chinese: 我吹灭了蜡烛。

detailed_translations.english: If you blow out a flame or a candle, you blow at it so that it stops burning

name: go by ...
trans: na. 走过；以…为根据(作判断)；〈美〉顺道访问；受…所控制

name: get lost
trans: v. 迷路；迷失；陷入…而忽略了…

sentences.english: A: Yeah.But it’s easy to get lost in the forest and compass is useless there.
sentences.chinese: 是的。 但那里的森林很容易迷路，而且指南针在那儿派不上用场。

sentences.english: Of course, most men have no interest in being there and that is why they get lost in the aisles.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，大多数男人还是对在超市不感兴趣的，这也是为什么他们在过道都会迷路的原因。

sentences.english: It might seem impossible to get lost in the modern world with its ubiquity of digital maps, but there is more than one way to be lost.
sentences.chinese: 在这个到处都有电子地图的现代世界，迷路恐怕不太可能发生了，但我们还是有不只一种会导致迷失的方法。

name: Can you tell me the way to ...?
sound like
trans: 听起来像；听起来象；听看来像

name: have the flu
trans: 得了流感；得流感；患流感

sentences.english: I looked up at my friend sitting across from me.
sentences.chinese: 我抬头看向坐在我对面的朋友。

sentences.english: She grew up in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 她在东京长大。

detailed_translations.english: When someone grows up, they gradually change from being a child into being an adult

name: stop ... doing ...
trans: 停止做某事；停止正在做的事；停止正在做的事情

name: run a business
trans: 做生意；经营生意；经营企业

name: on foot
trans: na. 步行；在进行中；徒步

sentences.english: He vainly hope to travel round the world on foot.
sentences.chinese: 他梦想步行周游世界。

sentences.english: I missed the regular bus, so I had to go to work on foot.
sentences.chinese: 早上没赶上班车，没奈何只好步行去上班。

sentences.english: He continues up the mountain on foot, in the snow and sleet, and he's getting sick from the cold.
sentences.chinese: 在冰雨的天气里，他继续步行朝着山上前进，因为天气寒冷，他开始变得不舒服了。

name: get on
trans: na. 上马；安上；过日子；相投 (with together)

name: get off
trans: na. 下车；脱下(衣服等)；脱(衣)；下(马)

sentences.english: That roof is dangerous, do get off.
sentences.chinese: 那房顶太危险，千万要下来。

sentences.english: Excuse me, I have to get off at the next stop.
sentences.chinese: 劳驾，我必须在下一站下车。

sentences.english: Democracy would take us where we wanted to go, not our own effort.Sometimes you have to get off and push.
sentences.chinese: 民主会把我们带到我们想去的地方，但光靠我们的努力还不行，有时候要下车推一推。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下（飞机、火车、公共汽车等）

sentences.english: I’ve always wanted to be able to speak Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想学会讲日语。

detailed_translations.english: have enough freedom, power, time, or money to do something

name: stay up late
trans: un. 整晚不睡；守着；迟睡

sentences.english: Doctors suggest that people should not stay up late even on holidays.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议，即使在节假日人们也不应该熬夜。

sentences.english: Researchers have verified the pattern that most parents have observed: sleep patterns change at puberty, and kids can’t seem to get out of bed in the morning. But they still stay up late at night.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们证实了大多数家长所观察到的情况：孩子的睡眠习惯在青春期时有所变化，尽管孩子们早上起不了床，他们在晚上依然精神抖擞地熬夜。

sentences.english: I want to turn on the television.
sentences.chinese: 我想打开电视机。

detailed_translations.english: When you turn on a piece of equipment or a supply of something, you cause heat, sound, or water to be produced by adjusting the controls

name: travel at the speed of light

detailed_translations.english: constantly or very frequently

sentences.english: If this describes you - just say no to it from now on.
sentences.chinese: 如果这些描述的就是你，应该从现在开始不要再做这样的事了。

sentences.english: In every beginning think of the end.
sentences.chinese: 凡事开头时就要想到它的后果。

detailed_translations.english: very

sentences.english: No, blacks have all kinds of jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不，黑人从事各种各样的工作。

sentences.english: People have all kinds of ideas about what it should be.
sentences.chinese: 人们对创新是什么有各种各样的想法。

sentences.english: This seemed horrible to me, but I got all kinds of responses.
sentences.chinese: 这对我来说很可怕，但我得到了各种各样的反馈。

name: not only ... but also ...
trans: 不仅……而且；不但而且；两个不仅……而且

name: take up
trans: na. 拿起；举起；拾起；给搭(火车等)

sentences.english: I know how busy you must be and naturally I wouldn't want to take up too much of your time.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你一定很忙，当然我不想占用你太多的时间。

sentences.english: A good deal of my time is taken up with driving the children to soccer games.
sentences.chinese: 我的许多时间都用在开车送孩子们去参加足球比赛。

detailed_translations.english: If something takes up a particular amount of time, space, or effort, it uses that amount

name: up and down
trans: na. 忽上忽下；各处；来来去去；升降浮沉

sentences.english: The escalator wafts us up and down every day.
sentences.chinese: 自动扶梯天天送我们上上下下。

sentences.english: What you do is squat up and down really fast.
sentences.chinese: 你 所要做的就是真正快速地上下蹲坐。

detailed_translations.english: to a higher position and then a lower position, several times

sentences.english: If you drive to work, park at the far end of the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 如果你开车上班，那么就将汽车泊在停车场的最远端。

sentences.english: They emerged from the darkness and gathered like pilgrims, lining up beneath floodlights in the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 他们从暗处冒出，像朝圣者一样汇聚在一起，在停车场的强光灯下排队。

sentences.english: Sitting in our usual parking lot, I was holding my book, watching her over the top of it.
sentences.chinese: 我们像往常一样在那个停车场里坐着，我拿了本书，从书的上边向她望去。

sentences.english: His business went under because of competition from the large corporations.

sentences.english: There were fewer temporary engineers to plug in in that city because of low pay.

sentences.english: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
